					[856] cell 'Magento Open Source June release brings important accessibility and security updates We are excited to announce great new accessibility updates in PWA Studio, along with multiple security updates in our June release. step_data.thought:
Looking at the current page accessibility tree, I can see that I'm already on the notification center page. The page title is 'Notifications / Other Settings / System / Magento Admin' and the main heading [682] is 'Notifications'. The page displays a table with 5 notification records as indicated by the text '5 records found'.

The table shows various system messages and alerts with their severity, date, message content, and available actions. There are notifications with different severity levels including 'CRITICAL', 'MAJOR', and 'NOTICE'. 

Since the goal was to navigate to the notification center to view system messages and alerts, and I'm already on that page with the notifications visible, I've successfully completed the task. I should inform the user that we've reached the notification center and summarize what we can see.
step_data.action: stop('You are now in the notification center where you can view all system messages and alerts. The page displays 5 notifications with different severity levels (CRITICAL, MAJOR, NOTICE). Each notification shows its severity, date added, message content, and available actions like "Mark as Read" or "Remove". You can use the actions dropdown at the top to perform bulk operations on selected notifications.')
